attributes.action: birmingham city councilcan not close the holte end
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: birmingham city council are trying to close the back 10 rows of Aston Villa F.C's Holte End which is like the kop of Liverpool F.C meanin over 1000 fans lose their seats which has cost lots of money

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "birmingham city council can not close the holte end."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15836.asp

Prime Minister's Office
